recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with slices of fresh mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Slice and serve hot.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
instructions: In a wok, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced ginger and garlic, sauté until fragrant.
Add cubed tofu and stir-fry until golden brown.
Add broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour soy sauce over the stir-fry and toss to combine.
Serve over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, cream together softened butter, brown sugar, and white sugar.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add to the wet ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté sliced chicken in butter until fully cooked.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and grated Parmesan cheese. Stir until the cheese is melted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Combine the Alfredo sauce with cooked pasta.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa Chicken
instructions: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper.
Grill or bake chicken until fully cooked.
In a bowl, combine diced mango, chopped red onion, cilantro, minced jalapeño, and lime juice.
Dice the cooked chicken and mix it with the mango salsa.
Serve over cooked rice.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, diced avocado, halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, diced red bell pepper, and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with lemon vinaigrette dressing and toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Chill in the refrigerator before serving.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast in the oven until golden brown.
In a bowl, combine diced tomatoes, chopped fresh basil, minced garlic, and a drizzle of olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Top each toasted baguette slice with the tomato-basil mixture.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch to create the sauce.
In a wok, stir-fry thinly sliced beef until browned. Remove from the wok.
Stir-fry broccoli florets, minced garlic, and minced ginger in the same wok.
Add the cooked beef back to the wok and pour the sauce over the mixture.
Stir until everything is coated and heated through.
Serve over cooked white rice.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange alternating slices of tomatoes and fresh mozzarella on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and extra virgin olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a refreshing salad.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
instructions: Cook linguine pasta according to package instructions.
In a skillet, sauté minced garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque.
Pour in white wine and lemon juice. Simmer until the sauce slightly thickens.
Season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.
Toss cooked linguine in the shrimp scampi sauce.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, biryani masala, and salt.
In a pot, sauté sliced onions until golden brown. Remove half for later use.
Layer marinated chicken, chopped tomatoes, half of the fried onions, and rice in the pot.
Top with ghee, green chilies, fresh coriander leaves, mint leaves, and the remaining fried onions.
Cover and cook on low heat until the rice is fully cooked and aromatic.
Serve hot, garnished with additional coriander and mint leaves.

recipes.name: Chicken Karahi
instructions: In a wok (karahi), heat cooking oil and sauté minced garlic until golden brown.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.
Add chopped tomatoes, green chilies, ginger, and spices. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Cover and simmer until the chicken is tender and the oil separates from the masala.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.name: Aloo Keema
instructions: In a pan, heat cooking oil and sauté chopped onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté until fragrant.
Add ground beef and cook until browned. Drain excess oil if needed.
Add diced potatoes, chopped tomatoes, and spices. Mix well.
Cover and simmer until the potatoes are tender and the masala is well-cooked.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.name: Chapli Kebabs
instructions: In a large bowl, mix ground beef, chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies, coriander leaves, and pomegranate seeds.
Add ginger-garlic paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
Add an egg to bind the mixture and form into round flat kebabs.
Heat cooking oil in a pan and shallow fry the kebabs until browned on both sides.
Serve hot with naan or mint chutney.

recipes.name: Saag (Spinach) with Makki di Roti
instructions: Boil mustard greens and spinach until tender. Drain and blend into a coarse paste.
In a pan, sauté chopped onions, green chilies, and grated ginger in ghee until golden brown.
Add the greens paste and cook until it thickens.
Meanwhile, knead cornmeal with water to make a dough. Roll into rotis (flatbreads).
Cook the rotis on a griddle until golden brown.
Serve hot saag with makki di roti and a dollop of ghee.

recipes.name: Japanese Ramen Soup
instructions: Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions and set aside.
In a pot, combine chicken broth, soy sauce, mirin, and sesame oil. Bring to a simmer.
Add sliced shiitake mushrooms and chopped bok choy. Cook until vegetables are tender.
Divide the cooked noodles into serving bowls and ladle the hot broth over them.
Top with green onions, soft-boiled eggs, grilled chicken slices, and nori.
Serve hot and enjoy the authentic Japanese ramen!

recipes.name: Moroccan Chickpea Tagine
instructions: In a tagine or large pot, sauté chopped onions and minced garlic until softened.
Add diced carrots, chopped tomatoes, and cooked chickpeas.
Season with cumin, coriander, cinnamon, and paprika. Stir to coat.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Cook until carrots are tender.
Stir in olives and garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
Serve this flavorful Moroccan dish with couscous or crusty bread.

recipes.name: Korean Bibimbap
ingredients: Beef bulgogi (marinated and grilled beef slices)
instructions: Arrange cooked white rice in a bowl.
Top with beef bulgogi, sautéed carrots, seasoned spinach, grilled zucchini, and blanched bean sprouts.
Place a fried egg on top and drizzle with gochujang and sesame oil.
Sprinkle with toasted sesame seeds before serving.
Mix everything together before enjoying this delicious Korean bibimbap!
Feel free to customize with additional vegetables or protein.

recipes.name: Greek Moussaka
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté sliced eggplants in olive oil until browned. Set aside.
In the same pan, cook chopped onions and minced garlic until softened.
Add ground lamb or beef and brown. Stir in crushed tomatoes, red wine, and spices.
In a separate saucepan, make béchamel sauce: melt butter, whisk in flour, add milk, and cook until thickened.
Remove from heat and stir in Parmesan cheese and egg yolks.
In a baking dish, layer eggplants and meat mixture. Top with béchamel sauce.
Bake for 40-45 minutes until golden brown. Let it cool before slicing.
Serve slices of moussaka warm and enjoy this Greek classic!

recipes.name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
instructions: Marinate chicken thighs in a mixture of yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, and Kashmiri red chili powder.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté the marinated chicken until browned.
Add tomato puree and cook until the oil separates. Stir in heavy cream.
Sprinkle kasuri methi, sugar, and salt. Simmer until the chicken is fully cooked.
Serve this creamy butter chicken over rice or with naan for an authentic Pakistani/Indian experience.

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry
instructions: In a pot, simmer green curry paste in coconut milk.
Add chicken, fish sauce, and sugar. Cook until chicken is tender.
Stir in sliced eggplant and bell peppers. Simmer until vegetables are cooked.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves.
Serve hot over jasmine rice and enjoy this Thai classic!

recipes.name: Mango Lassi
instructions: In a blender, combine diced mango, yogurt, milk, honey, and cardamom powder.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes and blend again until the lassi is chilled.
Pour into glasses and garnish with a sprinkle of cardamom.
Enjoy this refreshing Mango Lassi!

recipes.name: Italian Tiramisu
instructions: In a bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
In another bowl, mix mascarpone cheese and sugar until smooth.
Gently fold the whipped cream into the mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfinger cookies into brewed espresso and layer them in a serving dish.
Spread a layer of the mascarpone mixture over the cookies.
Repeat layers and finish with a dusting of cocoa powder.
Chill in the refrigerator for a few hours before serving.
Indulge in the decadence of this classic Italian Tiramisu!

recipes.name: Turkish Kebabs
instructions: In a bowl, mix ground meat, grated onions, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and spices.
Form the mixture into kebab shapes and grill until fully cooked.
Serve the kebabs on flatbread with a drizzle of tahini sauce.
Enjoy these flavorful Turkish Kebabs with your favorite sides.

recipes.name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine blueberries, banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add chia seeds for extra nutrition and blend briefly.
Pour into a glass and enjoy this nutritious Blueberry Banana Smoothie!

recipes.name: Mexican Street Corn (Elote)
instructions: Grill or roast corn on the cob until kernels are charred.
Brush each cob with mayonnaise, then sprinkle with crumbled Cotija cheese and chili powder.
Serve with lime wedges for squeezing over the top.
Enjoy this delicious and flavorful Mexican Street Corn!

recipes.name: Russian Borscht
instructions: In a pot, sauté chopped onions and garlic until softened.
Add shredded beets, cabbage, diced potatoes, grated carrots, and tomato paste.
Pour in broth and add bay leaves. Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Enjoy the hearty and comforting flavors of Russian Borscht!

recipes.name: South Indian Masala Dosa
ingredients: Dosa batter (fermented rice and urad dal batter)
instructions: In a pan, heat ghee and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and curry leaves.
Add chopped onions, green chilies, and turmeric powder. Sauté until onions are golden brown.
Mix in boiled and mashed potatoes. Cook until well combined and seasoned.
Spread dosa batter on a hot griddle to make thin pancakes.
Place a spoonful of the potato mixture in the center, fold, and serve hot.
Pair with coconut chutney for a delicious South Indian meal.

recipes.name: Lebanese Falafel Wrap
instructions: Warm falafel balls according to package instructions.
Place a generous serving of falafel in the center of each wrap.
Top with diced tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, red onions, shredded lettuce, and fresh parsley.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and wrap tightly.
Enjoy this Lebanese Falafel Wrap filled with fresh and flavorful ingredients!

recipes.name: Brazilian Caipirinha
instructions: In a glass, muddle lime wedges with granulated sugar to release the juice.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour cachaça over the ice and stir well.
Sip and enjoy the refreshing taste of the Brazilian Caipirinha!
Adjust sugar and lime to suit your taste preferences.

recipes.name: Spanish Patatas Bravas
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss diced potatoes with olive oil, minced garlic, and smoked paprika. Roast until crispy.
In a small saucepan, heat tomato sauce, mayonnaise, and hot sauce. Stir until warm.
Drizzle the sauce over the roasted potatoes and garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve these flavorful Spanish Patatas Bravas as a delicious appetizer.

recipes.name: Vietnamese Fresh Spring Rolls
instructions: Dip rice paper wrappers in warm water to soften.
Lay a wrapper on a flat surface and fill with shrimp, rice vermicelli, lettuce, carrots, cucumber, and mint leaves.
Fold the sides of the wrapper and roll tightly to seal.
Serve these Vietnamese Fresh Spring Rolls with peanut dipping sauce.
Enjoy these light and refreshing rolls as a delightful appetizer or snack.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, red onion, feta cheese, and parsley.
Drizzle with lemon vinaigrette dressing and toss to combine.
Chill before serving. This Mediterranean Quinoa Salad is perfect as a refreshing side dish.

recipes.name: Japanese Matcha Green Tea Ice Cream
instructions: In a saucepan, heat heavy cream, whole milk, and granulated sugar until it begins to steam.
Whisk in matcha green tea powder until fully combined.
In a separate bowl, whisk egg yolks. Slowly pour the hot milk mixture into the yolks, whisking continuously.
Return the mixture to the saucepan and heat until it thickens. Do not boil.
Strain the mixture and let it cool. Churn in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Freeze until firm. Indulge in the creamy goodness of Japanese Matcha Green Tea Ice Cream!

recipes.name: Brazilian Chocolate Brigadeiros
instructions: In a saucepan, combine sweetened condensed milk, cocoa powder, and unsalted butter.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and pulls away from the pan.
Let the mixture cool. Grease your hands with butter and roll into small balls.
Coat the brigadeiros in chocolate sprinkles.
These Brazilian Chocolate Brigadeiros are a delightful sweet treat!

recipes.name: Mexican Chicken Enchiladas
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, mix shredded chicken with black beans, corn, and chopped cilantro.
Fill each corn tortilla with the chicken mixture and roll tightly.
Place the rolled enchiladas in a baking dish, cover with enchilada sauce, and sprinkle with shredded cheese.
Bake until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot with a dollop of sour cream. Enjoy these delicious Mexican Chicken Enchiladas!

recipes.name: Thai Coconut Shrimp Curry
instructions: In a pan, simmer coconut milk with red curry paste, fish sauce, and sugar.
Add sliced bell peppers and zucchini. Cook until vegetables are tender.
Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink and opaque.
Stir in fresh basil leaves.
Serve this Thai Coconut Shrimp Curry over jasmine rice for a flavorful meal.

recipes.name: Greek Spanakopita
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, mix cooked chopped spinach with crumbled feta, chopped onions, beaten eggs, olive oil, dill, salt, and pepper.
Layer sheets of phyllo dough in a baking dish, brushing each layer with olive oil.
Spread the spinach and feta mixture over the phyllo layers.
Top with more phyllo layers, brushing each with olive oil.
Bake until golden brown. Slice and serve this delicious Greek Spanakopita!

recipes.name: Moroccan Couscous Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked couscous, chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, mint leaves, and crumbled feta.
Drizzle with lemon vinaigrette dressing and toss to combine.
Chill before serving. This Moroccan Couscous Salad makes a refreshing side dish.

recipes.name: Classic Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle fresh mint leaves with granulated sugar and lime wedges to release the flavors.
Add white rum and stir well.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and top with club soda.
Stir gently and garnish with a sprig of mint.
Sip and enjoy the classic and refreshing taste of a Mojito!

recipes.name: Caprese Bruschetta
instructions: Preheat the oven broiler.
Place baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast under the broiler until golden.
In a bowl, combine diced tomatoes, sliced fresh mozzarella, minced garlic, and chopped fresh basil.
Drizzle with olive oil, balsamic glaze, and season with salt and pepper.
Spoon the tomato and mozzarella mixture onto the toasted baguette slices.
Serve these delightful Caprese Bruschettas as a quick and tasty appetizer.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: In a wok or skillet, heat sesame oil and sauté minced garlic and grated ginger until fragrant.
Add thinly sliced chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in broccoli florets, sliced bell peppers, and julienned carrots. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour soy sauce and teriyaki sauce over the stir-fry. Toss to combine.
Serve this quick Teriyaki Chicken Stir-Fry over cooked rice for a delicious meal.

recipes.name: Mango Avocado Salsa
instructions: In a bowl, combine diced mango, diced avocado, finely chopped red onion, and chopped cilantro.
Drizzle with fresh lime juice and season with salt and pepper. Toss gently to combine.
Serve this refreshing Mango Avocado Salsa with tortilla chips for a quick and tasty snack.

recipes.name: Shrimp and Asparagus Stir-Fry
ingredients: Asparagus spears, trimmed and cut into pieces
Cooked noodles or rice for serving
instructions: In a wok or skillet, heat sesame oil and sauté minced garlic, grated ginger, and red pepper flakes until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink and opaque.
Stir in asparagus pieces and cook until crisp-tender.
Pour soy sauce over the stir-fry and toss to combine.
Serve this quick Shrimp and Asparagus Stir-Fry over cooked noodles or rice.

recipes.name: Italian Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to the highest temperature your oven can go.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface and transfer to a pizza stone or baking sheet.
Brush the dough with olive oil and sprinkle minced garlic over the surface.
Arrange thinly sliced tomatoes and fresh mozzarella slices on the dough.
Bake until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Top with fresh basil leaves and season with salt and pepper. Slice and serve this classic Margherita Pizza.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook penne pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, warm basil pesto sauce. Add cooked pasta and toss to coat evenly.
Stir in halved cherry tomatoes and cook until they soften slightly.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve this quick and flavorful Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes for a delicious meal.

recipes.name: Hawaiian Chicken Skewers
instructions: Preheat the grill or grill pan.
In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, pineapple juice, ketchup, brown sugar, and minced garlic to make the marinade.
Thread chicken chunks, pineapple chunks, bell pepper slices, and red onion wedges onto soaked wooden skewers.
Brush the skewers with the marinade and grill until the chicken is cooked through.
Serve these Hawaiian Chicken Skewers with rice or as a tasty appetizer.

recipes.name: Cucumber Avocado Rolls
ingredients: Pickled ginger and wasabi for serving
instructions: Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi rolling mat.
Spread seasoned sushi rice evenly over the nori, leaving a small border at the top.
Arrange julienned cucumber and sliced avocado along the bottom edge of the rice.
Roll the nori tightly from the bottom, using the bamboo mat to shape the roll.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces. Serve these refreshing Cucumber Avocado Rolls with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Chill before serving. Enjoy this quick and refreshing Mediterranean Chickpea Salad.

recipes.name: Pineapple Coconut Smoothie
instructions: In a blender, combine pineapple chunks, coconut milk, Greek yogurt, banana, and honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes and blend again until the smoothie is chilled.
Pour into a glass and enjoy the tropical goodness of this Pineapple Coconut Smoothie!

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices 30 minutes or overnight.
Sear chicken until browned; set aside.
Simmer tomato puree with spices and butter 10 minutes.
Add cream and chicken; simmer until cooked through.
Serve with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Roasted Pepper Shakshuka
instructions: Sauté peppers, onion, and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Stir in tomatoes and paprika; simmer 10 minutes.
Make wells and crack in eggs.
Cover and cook to desired doneness.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Brown beef strips; remove.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.
Add broth and mustard; simmer.
Return beef and stir in sour cream off heat.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.name: Authentic Pad Thai
instructions: Soak noodles until pliable; drain.
Stir-fry protein; push to side and scramble eggs.
Add noodles, tamarind, fish sauce, and sugar; toss.
Add bean sprouts and scallions; cook 1-2 minutes.
Serve topped with peanuts and lime.

recipes.name: Spiced Carrot & Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic with cumin until fragrant.
Add carrots, lentils, and stock; simmer until tender.
Blend partially for a creamy texture.
Finish with lemon juice and olive oil.
Season and serve warm.

recipes.name: Perfect Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados with lime and salt.
Fold in onion, jalapeño, and cilantro.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Serve immediately with chips or tacos.

recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Pound chicken thin; dredge in flour, egg, and crumbs mixed with Parmesan.
Pan-fry until golden.
Top with marinara and mozzarella.
Bake until cheese melts and chicken is cooked through.
Serve with spaghetti.

recipes.name: Pani Puri (Golgappa)
instructions: Mix potatoes and chickpeas; season with chaat masala.
Blend mint, cilantro, chilies, spices, and water for pani; chill.
Crack puri tops and fill with potato-chickpea mix.
Add tamarind chutney and pour in pani.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Green Shakshuka
instructions: Sauté green veg, scallions, and garlic with cumin.
Add a splash of water; simmer until tender.
Make wells and add eggs; cover until set.
Serve with dollops of yogurt and flatbread.

recipes.name: Chef John's Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Brown beef and set aside.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.
Deglaze with wine; add stock and simmer.
Return beef; finish with crème fraîche and paprika.
Serve over buttered noodles.

recipes.name: Classic Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk yolks with sugar until pale; fold in mascarpone.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso (and Marsala if using).
Layer soaked cookies and mascarpone cream.
Chill at least 4 hours.
Dust with cocoa and serve.

recipes.name: Banana Banana Bread
instructions: Mash bananas; whisk with sugar, eggs, butter, and vanilla.
Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Pour into greased loaf pan.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) until a tester comes out clean.
Cool before slicing.

recipes.name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
instructions: Soften chopped dates in hot water with baking soda.
Cream butter and sugar; beat in eggs.
Fold in flour and dates; bake until risen.
Simmer cream, butter, and sugar for toffee sauce.
Drench warm pudding with sauce.

recipes.name: BraveTart Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Whisk dry ingredients.
Cream butter and sugars; add egg and vanilla.
Fold in dry mix and chopped chocolate.
Scoop and chill briefly.
Bake until edges are set and centers soft.

recipes.name: Chef John's Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices, garlic, and ginger.
Brown chicken; set aside.
Simmer tomato sauce with spices.
Add coconut milk and chicken; simmer to thicken.
Garnish with cilantro.

recipes.name: Quick Baked Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Coat chicken with crumbs and Parmesan.
Bake until nearly cooked.
Top with marinara and mozzarella.
Bake until cheese melts and chicken is done.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Classic Pad Thai
instructions: Soak noodles; drain.
Stir-fry protein and eggs.
Add noodles and sauce (fish sauce, tamarind, sugar).
Toss in sprouts and scallions.
Serve with peanuts and lime.

recipes.name: Winter Vegetable & Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté leek, carrot, and garlic.
Add lentils, stock, and bay; simmer until tender.
Season to taste and serve warm.

recipes.name: Taquero-Style Guacamole
instructions: Blend tomatillos, jalapeños, cilantro, water, and salt.
Add avocados and lime; blend until pourable.
Adjust salt and serve with tacos.

recipes.name: Authentic Tiramisu
instructions: Whip egg yolks with sugar; fold into mascarpone.
Dip ladyfingers quickly in espresso.
Layer cookies and cream; repeat.
Chill several hours; dust with cocoa.

recipes.name: Joy's Easy Banana Bread
instructions: Combine mashed bananas with wet ingredients.
Stir in dry ingredients just to combine.
Bake in greased loaf pan until set.
Cool on rack and slice.

recipes.name: Self-Saucing Sticky Toffee Chocolate Pudding
instructions: Mix dry ingredients and chopped dates.
Stir in milk and melted butter; spread in dish.
Sprinkle with brown sugar and cocoa.
Pour over boiling water to create sauce.
Bake until sponge rises and sauce forms.

recipes.name: Roasted Garlic Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados with lime and salt.
Fold in roasted garlic, onion, and cilantro.
Adjust seasoning and serve.

recipes.name: Indian Chicken Tikka Masala (Weeknight)
instructions: Marinate chicken briefly in yogurt and curry paste.
Brown chicken pieces.
Simmer tomatoes with garlic and ginger.
Add cream and chicken; cook until done.
Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Green Shakshuka with Harissa & Crispy Shallots
instructions: Crisp shallots in oil; set aside.
Wilt greens with garlic and harissa; add splash of water.
Make wells; crack in eggs and cover to set.
Top with yogurt and crispy shallots.

recipes.name: Kimchi Fried Rice (Kimchi Bokkeumbap)
instructions: Heat oil in a wok; sauté chopped kimchi until fragrant.
Stir in kimchi juice, gochujang, soy sauce, and a pinch of sugar.
Add rice; stir-fry until hot and evenly colored.
Finish with sesame oil and scallions.
Top with fried eggs and sesame seeds; serve.

recipes.name: Okonomiyaki (Japanese Savory Pancake)
instructions: Whisk flour with dashi and eggs to a smooth batter.
Fold in cabbage and scallions.
Pour batter in an oiled skillet; lay bacon on top.
Cook until golden on both sides and set.
Top with okonomiyaki sauce, mayo, bonito, and aonori.

recipes.name: Pho Ga (Vietnamese Chicken Noodle Soup)
instructions: Simmer chicken with charred onion, ginger, and spices until tender.
Shred chicken; strain broth and season with fish sauce and sugar.
Cook rice noodles per package.
Divide noodles and chicken in bowls; ladle hot broth.
Garnish with herbs, lime, sprouts, and chiles.

recipes.name: Chiles Rellenos (Cheese-Stuffed Poblano Peppers)
instructions: Roast poblanos, peel, and carefully remove seeds.
Stuff each with cheese.
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks; fold in yolks for batter.
Dust peppers with flour, dip in batter, and fry until golden.
Serve with warm tomato salsa.

recipes.name: Paella Valenciana
instructions: Brown meats in a wide paella pan with olive oil.
Add beans and sauté briefly; stir in grated tomato and paprika.
Pour in stock; season with saffron and salt; bring to a boil.
Add rice and distribute evenly; cook uncovered until rice is tender and socarrat forms.
Rest 5 minutes with rosemary sprig; serve.

recipes.name: Coq au Vin
instructions: Brown bacon; remove. Brown chicken in rendered fat.
Add mushrooms, onions, garlic; sauté.
Stir in tomato paste, wine, stock, thyme, bay; simmer until chicken is tender.
Make a beurre manié (butter + flour) and whisk in to thicken.
Season and serve with mashed potatoes.

recipes.name: Doro Wat (Ethiopian Chicken Stew)
instructions: Slowly cook onions in niter kibbeh until deeply caramelized.
Add garlic, ginger, berbere, and tomato paste; cook until fragrant.
Add chicken and stock; simmer until tender and thick.
Stir in lemon juice; nestle hard-boiled eggs to warm.
Serve with injera.

recipes.name: Tabbouleh
instructions: Soak bulgur in boiling water until tender; drain well.
Mix with parsley, mint, tomatoes, cucumber, and scallions.
Dress with lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Chill 20 minutes; serve.

recipes.name: Lomo Saltado
instructions: Stir-fry beef over high heat; season and remove.
Sauté onions and tomatoes briefly; return beef.
Add aji amarillo, soy sauce, and vinegar; toss quickly.
Finish with cilantro and serve with fries and rice.

recipes.name: Chicken Souvlaki with Tzatziki
instructions: Marinate chicken with oil, lemon, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper 30 minutes.
Thread onto skewers and grill until cooked.
Mix yogurt, grated cucumber, dill, vinegar, salt for tzatziki.
Serve skewers with tzatziki and pita.

recipes.name: Lahmacun (Turkish Flatbread with Spiced Lamb)
instructions: Heat a stone or baking sheet at 500°F (260°C).
Mix lamb with onion, tomato, parsley, tomato paste, spices, oil, and salt.
Roll dough very thin; spread a thin layer of topping.
Bake until edges crisp and topping cooked, 6-8 minutes.
Serve with lemon and herbs; roll and eat.

recipes.name: Chicken Pastilla (Bastilla)
instructions: Stew chicken with onions and spices; shred meat.
Reduce cooking liquid; whisk in eggs to curdle slightly.
Layer buttered phyllo in a pan; add chicken, egg mixture, and almonds.
Fold and bake until golden.
Dust with powdered sugar and cinnamon; slice.

recipes.name: Masoor Dal Tadka (Red Lentil Dal)
instructions: Simmer lentils with turmeric and salt until soft; whisk to creamy.
In ghee, bloom cumin; sauté garlic, onion, tomato, and chile.
Pour tadka over dal; simmer 2 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or roti.

recipes.name: Risotto alla Milanese
instructions: Sweat onion in butter; add rice and toast.
Deglaze with wine; stir until absorbed.
Add hot stock a ladle at a time, stirring often.
Bloom saffron in stock; add midway.
Finish with butter and Parmesan to all'onda; season.

recipes.name: New England Clam Chowder
instructions: Cook bacon; reserve fat and crumble bacon.
Sauté onion and celery; add butter and flour for a roux.
Add clam juice, bay, thyme, and potatoes; simmer until tender.
Stir in milk and clams; heat gently.
Season and serve topped with bacon.

recipes.name: Mapo Tofu
instructions: Bloom doubanjiang and douchi in oil until red and fragrant.
Add pork; cook through with garlic and ginger.
Pour in stock, soy, and wine; simmer.
Slide in tofu; gently heat.
Thicken with slurry; finish with Sichuan pepper and scallions.

recipes.name: Tonkatsu (Japanese Pork Cutlet)
instructions: Season cutlets; dredge in flour, dip in egg, and coat with panko.
Fry in 350°F (175°C) oil until golden and cooked through.
Drain on rack; slice.
Serve with tonkatsu sauce, cabbage, and lemon.

recipes.name: Som Tam (Thai Green Papaya Salad)
instructions: Pound garlic and chiles with palm sugar in a mortar.
Add fish sauce and lime; mix.
Lightly bruise green beans and tomatoes; add papaya and toss.
Top with peanuts and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Filipino Chicken Adobo
instructions: Marinate chicken with soy, vinegar, garlic, bay, and pepper 30 minutes.
Sear chicken; add marinade, water, and sugar.
Simmer until tender and sauce reduces and glazes.
Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Jamaican Jerk Chicken
instructions: Blend marinade ingredients until smooth.
Marinate chicken at least 4 hours.
Grill over medium heat until charred and cooked through.
Rest and serve with lime.

recipes.name: Khachapuri (Georgian Cheese Bread, Adjaruli)
instructions: Make a soft dough; rise until doubled.
Mix cheeses.
Shape dough into boat; fill with cheese mixture.
Bake until golden; crack an egg on top and bake briefly to set.
Finish with butter and serve hot.

recipes.name: Negroni
instructions: Stir equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice until chilled.
Strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass.
Express and garnish with an orange peel.

recipes.name: Paloma
instructions: Salt the rim of a highball glass if desired.
Add tequila and lime; fill with ice.
Top with grapefruit soda (or juice + soda); stir gently.
Garnish with grapefruit wedge.

recipes.name: Agua de Jamaica (Hibiscus Tea)
instructions: Boil water; steep hibiscus 10 minutes.
Strain; stir in sugar to taste.
Chill and add lime if desired; serve over ice.

recipes.name: Iced Matcha Latte
instructions: Whisk matcha with hot water until smooth.
Fill a glass with ice; add milk.
Pour matcha over milk; sweeten to taste and stir.

recipes.name: Old Fashioned
instructions: In a rocks glass, add simple syrup and bitters.
Add whiskey and a large ice cube.
Stir until chilled and slightly diluted.
Express orange peel over the glass and garnish.

recipes.name: Classic Margarita
instructions: Salt half the rim of a chilled rocks glass.
Shake tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau with ice.
Strain over fresh ice into the glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

recipes.name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Dry shake bourbon, lemon, simple syrup, and egg white (if using).
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
Dot with bitters to garnish.

recipes.name: French 75
instructions: Shake gin, lemon, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a flute and top with Champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

recipes.name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake vodka, espresso, coffee liqueur, and syrup with ice.
Strain into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with three coffee beans.

recipes.name: Manhattan
instructions: Stir rye, vermouth, and bitters with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with a brandied cherry.

recipes.name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer and stir gently.
Garnish with lime and mint.

recipes.name: Mai Tai (Trader Vic-style)
instructions: Shake aged rum, curaçao, orgeat, and lime with ice.
Strain over crushed ice in a rocks glass.
Float dark rum and garnish with mint.

recipes.name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients.
Add ice and shake again until frothy.
Strain into a coupe and dot with bitters.

recipes.name: Boulevardier
instructions: Stir whiskey, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice.
Strain into a coupe or rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

recipes.name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice.
Add Prosecco and Aperol (3:2).
Top with a splash of soda.
Garnish with an orange slice.

recipes.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball with ice.
Add ginger beer and a squeeze of lime.
Float rum on top and garnish with lime.

recipes.name: Spanish Red Sangria
instructions: Combine wine, brandy, orange juice, triple sec, and syrup in a pitcher.
Add sliced fruit and chill at least 2 hours.
Top with club soda and serve over ice.

recipes.name: Michelada
instructions: Rim a chilled pint glass with Tajín or salt.
Add lime juice, hot sauce, and Worcestershire (and tomato juice if using).
Fill with ice and top with beer; stir gently.

recipes.name: Thai Iced Tea
instructions: Steep Thai tea in hot water 5 minutes; strain.
Stir in sugar and cool.
Pour over ice and top with condensed milk and evaporated milk.

recipes.name: Horchata (Mexican Rice Drink)
instructions: Soak rice and cinnamon in water overnight; blend and strain.
Stir in evaporated milk, condensed milk, and vanilla.
Chill and serve over ice.

recipes.name: Arnold Palmer
instructions: Fill a tall glass with ice.
Mix half iced tea and half lemonade.
Garnish with a lemon wheel.

recipes.name: Shirley Temple
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Add soda and a splash of grenadine.
Stir and garnish with a cherry.

recipes.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee (Cà phê sữa đá)
instructions: Brew strong coffee using a phin filter.
Stir in condensed milk to taste.
Pour over a tall glass filled with ice.

recipes.name: Watermelon Agua Fresca
instructions: Blend watermelon with water until smooth.
Strain if desired; sweeten to taste with sugar and lime.
Serve over ice.

recipes.name: Homemade Ginger Beer (Non-Alcoholic)
instructions: Simmer ginger, sugar, and water 10 minutes; cool and strain.
Stir in lemon juice.
Pour syrup over ice and top with club soda.

recipes.name: Classic Hot Chocolate (Parisian-Style)
instructions: Heat milk and cream until steaming.
Whisk in chocolate until melted and smooth.
Sweeten to taste and add vanilla.
Serve hot with whipped cream.

recipes.name: Iced Chai Latte
instructions: Brew strong chai and cool.
Fill a glass with ice, add chai and milk.
Sweeten to taste and stir.

recipes.name: Golden Milk (Turmeric Latte)
instructions: Warm milk with turmeric, ginger, and cinnamon.
Sweeten with honey and add a pinch of black pepper.
Whisk until frothy and serve warm.
